name: Internet of Things London
description: Since 2011, we gather once a month to listen to talks from 3 speakers making the internet of things happen. Our talks cover urban infrastructure, smart grid, open hardware, quantified self, open data, environmental monitoring, smart products, smart homes and more.  Anything that puts a networked computer where none has gone before.

id: Our sponsors are Resin.io , Sherlock by One Fine Stay  & Zuhlke.
If you're new to the topic, have a look at  http://iot.london
Follow us at @iotlondon and use #iotlondon at the meetup to share with others.
We also send out a monthly newsletter to the group with events, competitions all related to the internet of things. Submit your suggestion to http://iot.london/submit
This meetup is organised and curated by Alexandra Deschamps-Sonsino (@iotwatch) a designer and consultant who has worked in this space since 2007.
NB: Please be aware that the meetup gets booked online very quickly but no-shows are frequent. One of the many challenges running free events in London :)

name: IoTBE - the Belgian Internet of Things community
description: This meetup is dedicated to the design practices, technologies, insights and opportunities around the next frontier information access - the Internet of Things (IoT). We want to cross-pollinate ideas from engineers, designers, researchers, data scientists and entrepreneurs to create meaningful and tangible solutions that will make information access more human, ubiquitous and commercially viable.
